ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(ISCHANGED( Partial_Payment__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Category__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Description__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Email__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Is_EInvoice__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Date__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Currency_Code__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Amount__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( External_Number__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Purchase_Order__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Dispatch_Orders__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( External_Serie__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Type__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( External_UUID__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: El campo no puede ser editado.
